text: Lidingöloppet is an annual cross-country running competition held in Lidingö in Sweden. It was held for first time in 1965. ==Other websites== *Lidingöloppet official website (press flag for English or Finnish) . *http://www.oppetarkiv.se/etikett/titel/Liding%C3%B6loppet/ The event at SVT's open archive Category:Sport in Sweden Category:Running Category:1965 establishments in Sweden
title: Lidingöloppet
